description.@en: Whether it be barrel-making, carpentry or furniture-making, I can do them all with equal finesse.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Woodworking. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Woodworking, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
